S.FORM: sa pangangan nu i Taywanay a pinacadadan a saculil namakay 1984 a mihcan i taywanay a pinacadan misakaput tu kingli a sapangangan nu pinacadan ani culilan i labu nina sapi yukiu ani culilan sapi sumad tunu i aayaway nu kahulaman a hananay a i hekalay a hulic. sapa sukas tunu nanutuasay a lalangawan atu sapa sukas tu ngangan nu niyadu`. sadikuday ani culilan i 1994 a mihcan waluway a bulad cacay a demiad. pakayni i nisanga`an nu tu kinpu pacunus tu hulic nu cudad u sumad han mala . sapi nu satalakaway tuni culilan pangangan nu pinacadan. kyu i 2005 a mihcan enemay a bulad sabaw lima a demiad masanga` tu nu miulicay sapikining atu , ani cudadan, pahecek hantu i waluway a bulad cacay a demiad u yincumin ad kuyniyan a demiad.
